change Michael had jangling around in
his pockets and even though there's

intro it's got a three four time
signature really eerie melody definitely
sets the tone of the album and then
there is a cover version of blaze Folies
clay pigeons not a song I'm terribly

plainly as a cover with its steady

really sharp melodies sharp lyrics
poetic lyrics as well as clear structure
it's easily the most coherent song on
the entire LP which really makes us

there are a few other acoustic ballads

it's really just a mixed bag of hit or

you know what I don't really think
